tasks.title: Setup React TypeScript Project with TailwindCSS
tasks.description: Initialize a React SPA with TypeScript support and configure TailwindCSS for styling. This establishes the foundation for the entire application.
tasks.details: Create React app using create-react-app or Vite with TypeScript template. Install and configure TailwindCSS following latest documentation. Setup tsconfig.json with strict mode enabled. Configure ESLint and Prettier for code quality. Ensure build process is optimized for static hosting (Vercel/Netlify). Create basic project structure with src/components, src/pages, src/utils, and src/styles directories.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify TypeScript compilation succeeds with no errors, TailwindCSS classes apply correctly to test component, build process completes and generates optimized bundle, and static hosting requirements are met.

subtasks.title: Initialize React TypeScript project with Vite
subtasks.description: Create a new React project with TypeScript support using Vite as the build tool
subtasks.details: Use Vite to create a new React TypeScript project. Run 'npm create vite@latest .' with React and TypeScript template. Install dependencies and verify the project builds successfully.

subtasks.title: Install and configure TailwindCSS
subtasks.description: Install TailwindCSS and configure it for the React project
subtasks.details: Install TailwindCSS and its dependencies. Configure tailwind.config.js with proper content paths. Add Tailwind directives to the main CSS file. Verify Tailwind classes work in components.

subtasks.title: Setup project directory structure
subtasks.description: Create organized directory structure for components, pages, utils, and styles
subtasks.details: Create src/components, src/pages, src/utils, and src/styles directories. Set up basic file organization following React best practices. Create index files for clean imports.

subtasks.title: Configure ESLint and Prettier
subtasks.description: Setup code quality tools for consistent formatting and error checking
subtasks.details: Install and configure ESLint with TypeScript and React rules. Setup Prettier for code formatting. Create configuration files and add npm scripts for linting and formatting.

subtasks.title: Configure TypeScript strict mode and paths
subtasks.description: Setup TypeScript configuration for strict type checking and path aliases
subtasks.details: Configure tsconfig.json with strict mode enabled. Setup path aliases for clean imports. Configure build settings for static hosting compatibility.

tasks.title: Design and Implement Core Data Structure
tasks.description: Define JSON-based data model for the 64-task matrix including goal, 8 focus areas, and 64 tasks with metadata and status tracking.
tasks.details: Create TypeScript interfaces: Goal (id, title, description, createdDate), FocusArea (id, title, description, goalId), Task (id, title, description, areaId, status, completedDate). Implement factory functions for creating new matrices. Design localStorage schema for persistence. Create utility functions for CRUD operations on the matrix structure. Include versioning for future migrations.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for creating new matrices, adding/editing/deleting areas and tasks, data validation, and localStorage serialization/deserialization. Verify data structure maintains referential integrity.

subtasks.title: Create TypeScript interfaces for data models
subtasks.description: Define TypeScript interfaces for Goal, FocusArea, and Task entities
subtasks.details: Create interfaces for Goal (id, title, description, createdDate), FocusArea (id, title, description, goalId), and Task (id, title, description, areaId, status, completedDate). Include proper typing for all properties and relationships.

subtasks.title: Implement factory functions for matrix creation
subtasks.description: Create functions to generate new matrices with default structures
subtasks.details: Implement factory functions for creating new Goal objects, FocusArea arrays, and empty task matrices. Include default values and proper initialization of all required properties.

subtasks.title: Design localStorage schema and persistence utilities
subtasks.description: Create schema for storing matrix data in browser localStorage
subtasks.details: Design JSON schema for localStorage persistence. Create utility functions for serialization/deserialization. Implement error handling for storage quota limits and data corruption.

subtasks.title: Create CRUD utility functions
subtasks.description: Implement functions for Create, Read, Update, Delete operations on matrix data
subtasks.details: Create utility functions for adding/removing/updating goals, focus areas, and tasks. Implement search and filtering capabilities. Ensure referential integrity is maintained across all operations.

subtasks.title: Add data validation and error handling
subtasks.description: Implement validation logic and error handling for data integrity
subtasks.details: Create validation functions for all data models. Implement error handling for invalid data states. Add type guards and runtime validation to prevent data corruption.

subtasks.title: Implement versioning system for migrations
subtasks.description: Create system for handling future data structure changes
subtasks.details: Implement versioning in the data schema. Create migration functions for upgrading old data formats. Add backward compatibility for data loading and forward compatibility for saving.

tasks.title: Build Interactive 64-Task Matrix Grid UI Component
tasks.description: Create the visual 8x8 grid interface displaying the matrix layout with goal at center and focus areas radiating outward.
tasks.details: Build Grid component using React with CSS Grid layout (8x8). Implement cell components for goal and task display. Add visual styling to distinguish goal cell, area headers, and task cells. Implement click handlers for cell selection and editing. Add responsive design considerations for desktop view. Create zoom/pan capabilities if needed. Use TailwindCSS for styling with custom grid configuration.
tasks.testStrategy: Render grid with correct cell count (64 + 1 goal), verify cell click events trigger correctly, check responsive behavior on desktop, confirm grid scales properly with content, test keyboard navigation if implemented.

subtasks.title: Create main Grid component with CSS Grid layout
subtasks.description: Build the core 8x8 grid component using CSS Grid
subtasks.details: Create Grid.tsx component using CSS Grid layout (8x8). Implement proper grid structure with 64 cells plus center goal cell. Set up grid positioning and sizing for desktop view.

subtasks.title: Implement cell components for different content types
subtasks.description: Create reusable cell components for goal, area headers, and tasks
subtasks.details: Build Cell.tsx, GoalCell.tsx, AreaHeaderCell.tsx, and TaskCell.tsx components. Implement different layouts and styling for each cell type. Add proper content rendering for each cell type.

subtasks.title: Add visual styling and cell differentiation
subtasks.description: Implement distinct visual styles for different cell types
subtasks.details: Use TailwindCSS to create distinct visual styling for goal cell, area headers, and task cells. Implement color coding, borders, and typography differences. Add hover states and visual hierarchy.

subtasks.title: Implement cell interaction and selection handlers
subtasks.description: Add click handlers and selection state management for cells
subtasks.details: Implement onClick handlers for cell selection. Add selection state management with React hooks. Implement keyboard navigation support. Add visual feedback for selected cells.

subtasks.title: Add responsive design considerations
subtasks.description: Implement responsive behavior for different screen sizes
subtasks.details: Add TailwindCSS responsive utilities for different breakpoints. Implement mobile-specific grid layouts. Add responsive font sizes and spacing. Test grid behavior on various screen sizes.

subtasks.title: Implement zoom and pan capabilities
subtasks.description: Add zoom controls and pan functionality for large matrices
subtasks.details: Implement zoom in/out controls with mouse wheel support. Add pan functionality for navigating large grids. Maintain grid proportions during zoom. Add zoom level indicators.

tasks.title: Implement Goal Setting and Focus Area Definition
tasks.description: Create UI and logic for users to set their central goal and define the 8 focus areas that support it.

Add step-by-step wizard flow guiding users through goal and area setup. Include input validation and character limits. Implement auto-save to localStorage. Add guidance text explaining the Harada Method structure. Create confirmation steps before proceeding.

subtasks.title: Create Goal Editor modal component

subtasks.title: Implement FocusArea Editor component

subtasks.title: Build step-by-step wizard flow

subtasks.title: Add input validation and character limits
subtasks.description: Implement validation rules for all form inputs
subtasks.details: Add validation for required fields, character limits, and input formats. Implement real-time validation feedback. Add proper error messages and field highlighting. Include validation for the 8-area requirement.

subtasks.title: Implement auto-save for form data
subtasks.description: Add auto-save functionality to prevent data loss during editing
subtasks.details: Implement debounced auto-save on form changes. Add visual save indicators. Store draft data in localStorage. Include recovery mechanism for unsaved changes on page reload.

subtasks.title: Add guidance text and contextual help
subtasks.description: Include helpful text explaining the Harada Method structure
subtasks.details: Add tooltips and guidance text explaining each step. Include examples of good goals and focus areas. Add references to Ohtani's success story. Create contextual help that appears based on user progress.

tasks.title: Develop Task Creation and Editing Interface
tasks.description: Build the core task management interface allowing users to create, edit, and organize 64 individual tasks across focus areas.
tasks.details: Implement Task Editor component with inline editing and modal forms. Create batch task entry mode for quick task creation. Add drag-and-drop reordering within focus areas. Implement task templates with suggested actions. Add character limits and validation for task descriptions. Support task status management (not started, in progress, completed). Implement priority/difficulty indicators. Create keyboard shortcuts for power users.

subtasks.title: Implement batch task entry and quick creation

subtasks.details: Create batch entry mode for quick task creation. Implement template-based task suggestions. Add bulk operations for setting status or priority across multiple tasks.

subtasks.title: Add drag-and-drop reordering and organization
subtasks.description: Implement drag-and-drop functionality for task organization

subtasks.title: Implement task status management and priority indicators

subtasks.title: Add keyboard shortcuts and accessibility features
